title: Vittoria debuts limited edition Open Corsa CX L’Eroica tubulars made by A. Dugast
content:
We’ve known a Vittoria x Dugast L’Eroica tubular tire was in the works since the Italian tire maker brought the handmade A. Dugast workshop into their fold earlier this spring. Now we have the details and you can order these limited-edition, handmade, numbered, and individually customized Vittoria L’Eroica tubulars made by A. Dugast for your […]

The post Vittoria debuts limited edition Open Corsa CX L’Eroica tubulars made by A. Dugast appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
